title: Chicago's Pitchfork Media bought by Conde Nast
text:
Chicago-based Pitchfork Media has been bought by Conde Nast.
The music-centric media brand, founded by CEO Ryan Schreiber in 1995, includes print and digital media as well as festivals, including its namesake indie music festival held each summer in Chicagoâ€™s Union Park) and in Paris.
Read more in Entertainment .
